purpose: Facilitate the creation and orchestration of AI agents with support for large language models and retrieval-augmented generation
principle: Built on Python with integration capabilities for OpenAI and LangChain SDK, allowing for extensible agent orchestration
reusability: Highly modular with support for custom extensions, provides APIs for seamless integration with existing AI and data frameworks
limitations: Primarily in alpha stage, may lack comprehensive documentation and stability for production use
name: open-assistant-api
description: The Open Assistant API is a ready-to-use, open-source, self-hosted agent/gpts orchestration creation framework, supporting customized extensions for LLM, RAG, function call, and tools capabilities. It also supports seamless integration with the openai/langchain sdk.
highlight: Self-hosted agent orchestration framework with customizable extensions for LLM and RAG capabilities
